p: Antioxidant effects of various constituents of A. cepa mainly quercetin, were shown in several studies. Treatment of hyperuricemic Wistar rats with 5 mg/kg quercetin for 14 days, led to a significant improvement in oxidative stress (Haidari et al. 2008). Pre-treatment of cortical neuronal cells derived from mouse embryos with quercetin (1-10 μM) for 30 min, protected cells from oxidative stress suggesting antioxidant effects of quercetin (Lee and Jung 2016).
